### Profile counts by Time QC and location QC
```{r, t_summary_time_location_qc1, echo = FALSE, message = FALSE, warning = FALSE}

summary_time_location_qc_table <- netcdf_time_location_qc_summary({{df}})

```

### Criteria of profile-level QC filtering

 - **Time QC**: 1
 - **Location QC**: 1 or -128

### Counts before and after filtering

```{r, t_summary_time_location_qc2, echo = FALSE, message = FALSE, warning = FALSE}
df_qc_filtered <- filter_profile_level_qc({{df}})

kbl_table(create_time_location_qc_summary_tab({{df}}, df_qc_filtered)) %>%
  kable_styling(font_size = 12)

{{df}} <- df_qc_filtered

```
